name: Sherwin-Williams
description: A vibrant facade of color, promising to brighten up your world. The Sherwin-Williams paint store is a dazzling oasis of color in a world of black and white. Walls are lined with endless swatches, each promising a fresh start, a brighter future, or at least a decent coat of 'Sunshine Yellow' to hide the drab wallpaper. The air is thick with the chemical tang of paint and the faint, hopeful scent of renovation. A friendly clerk in a crisp, white shirt is happy to help you choose the perfect shade to make your dreams a reality.
